1498873030625406977.text: Gov. Reynolds's attempt to rewrite history with inaccurate fear-mongering is disappointing. Over the past year, @POTUS & @HouseDemocrats passed the #AmericanRescuePlan to combat the COVID-19 pandemic, get shots in arms, and revitalize our economy. https://t.co/z7foJdqdtZ

1498858589024403465.text:
"We are stronger today than we were a year ago.

And we will be stronger a year from now than we are today." #SOTU

1498858538004852743.text:
.@POTUS: "So on this night, in our 245th year as a nation, I have come to report on the State of the Union.

"And my report is this: the State of the Union is strong—because you, the American people, are strong."

1498857569309315074.text: As the son of an Army veteran, I know firsthand the weight of the sacrifices our service members make to protect and serve our nation. I applaud @POTUS for reaffirming his commitment to protecting veterans who dedicated their lives to our country.

1498857520508682241.text:
Constant exposure to burn pits. 

Contaminated water at military bases. 
 
Radiation from atomic testing and cleanups.  
 
I look forward to working with @POTUS and @VetAffairsDems to make sure all toxic-exposed veterans can get the care and benefits they've earned. #SOTU

1498857439227224064.text:
We owe it to veterans to provide the care and benefits they've earned. 

That’s why it’s crucial we pass comprehensive legislation that expands access to care and benefits for veterans exposed to toxic substances – including burn pits – during their service. #SOTU

1498857065527316485.text:
The @POTUS Biden unity agenda:

✅ Beat the opioid crisis

✅ Take on the mental health crisis

✅ Support our veterans

✅ End cancer as we know it w/ Cancer Moonshot

#SOTU

1498856424880934916.text:
Advancing liberty and justice also requires protecting the rights of women. 
  
The constitutional right affirmed in Roe v. Wade -- standing precedent for half a century—is under attack as never before. We must protect a woman's right to choose.

1498855262207287301.text: When our highest Court begins to look more like America, we all stand to benefit. @POTUS made history by nominating Judge #KetanjiBrownJackson. #SOTU

1498854757900898307.text: .@POTUS is right: Pass universal background checks. Why should anyone on a terrorist list be able to purchase a weapon?

1498854715425230856.text: Gun violence legislation IS common sense legislation. Too many Americans have been lost already to this epidemic, leaving families and communities devastated.

1498854236515352579.text: I was proud to invite Abbey Conley as my #SOTU guest. She's a mother who knows firsthand how helpful the #ChildTaxCredit can be & the challenges of high-cost childcare. We must make CTC permanent!

1498853504579944450.text: .@POTUS & @HouseDemocrats are committed to stopping the pandemic, ending the shutdown of schools & businesses, & keeping our kids in schools. We have the tools we need. Let's get it done! #SOTU

1498852739786358786.text:
We know how incredibly effective vaccines are. If you’re vaccinated and boosted you have the highest degree of protection. 
  
We will never give up on vaccinating more Americans. #SOTU

1498852507367452679.text: Thanks to @POTUS & @HouseDemocrats, families and communities saw the benefits of his historic COVID relief package: shots in arms, money in pockets, children in schools, and people back to work. #AmericanRescuePlan

1498852325984808967.text: Hard working Americans deserve to be paid enough to afford to provide for themselves and their families. POTUS is right: we MUST raise the minimum wage.

1498852012271845382.text: Equal pay is essential to advancing America’s values of fairness and equity. America can not be the strongest economic power in the world if women are still being paid less in 2022. @POTUS is right, we must pass the #PaycheckFairnessAct

1498851318886281216.text: .@POTUS has a plan to cut the cost in half for most families & help parents, including millions of women who were forced to leave the workforce during the pandemic, to be able to get back to work.

Many families pay up to $14,000 a year for child care per child.  
 
Middle-class and working families shouldn’t have to pay more than 7% of their income for care of young children. We must lower childcare costs!

1442953353542074369.text: In today's increasingly industrialized world, we must work to preserve important cultural & environmental sites like the Great Dismal Swamp. Today's passage of my legislation is an important step in preserving the vital resources, wildlife, & historical importance of the region.

1442953304535814147.text: The Great Dismal Swamp was home to the ancestral lands of the Nansemond Indian Nation & the Haliwa-Saponi & Meherrin Tribes. It was a refuge for Free People of Color whose families resisted slavery & served as one of the only water-based stops on the Underground Railroad.

1442953260067815425.text: 🚨PASSED! Today, the House passed my Great Dismal Swamp National Heritage Area Act. The Great Dismal Swamp is an incredibly important historical, archaeological, and environmental site in the Commonwealth. https://t.co/Eox5q0NCFP

1131324971534430208.text: This year marks 400 years since the first African slaves were brought to Virginia in chains and yet many African Americans are still unable to visit and mourn their ancestors.  We need to preserve this history and culture. That is why the #BurialGroundsAct matters.

1131324970649444353.text: This injustice is not unique to Richmond or Virginia. I have come to realize this is the tragic reality for African American cemeteries throughout the country. These sites deserve funding for identification, preservation and restoration efforts.

1131324969818968067.text: I first became aware of this injustice when I was a state delegate as I witnessed this neglect in my own background. Richmond's Evergreen and East End Cemeteries are culturally and historically important to our Af Am community but are in dire need of preservation and restoration.

1131324969063976960.text: Why are so many of these burial grounds in a state of disrepair or utterly inaccessible? Local laws segregated burial grounds by race. These burial sites were often confined to marginal property or remote areas, and frequently failed to receive monetary support or maintenance.

1131324968212606980.text: I wanted to share a few thoughts about why this is so important. For far too long, African-American burial grounds have suffered neglect and abuse which is unacceptable. These are some of our most sacred spaces and they should be treated with respect and care.

1131324967507906561.text: Earlier today I was honored to discuss the African American Burial Grounds Network Act at a @NRDems subcommittee hearing, legislation I introduced with @RepAdams to preserve and protect the history and culture of African American burial sites.

1113150353371881472.text: We can't achieve #EqualPay without commonsense policy solutions such as the #PaycheckFairnessAct and I urge the Senate to pass this important legislation.

1113149095559008259.text: #EqualPay for equal work has the overwhelming support of the American people and the Senate needs to listen to the voices of their constituents.

1113147837699821568.text: Pay inequity is unacceptable and America’s workers deserve better. #EqualPay

1113146578779303936.text: It is important to note that #EqualPay is not just a woman’s issue as it impacts families, businesses & our economy.

1113145321394237442.text: Women can’t afford to wait. It’s time for #PaycheckFairnessAct to become the law of the land. #EqualPay

1113144062201040901.text: For African American women and Latinas the #paygap is even larger.  African American women on average earn only 61 cents and Latinas on average earn only 53 cents for every dollar earned by white, non-Hispanic men. #EqualPay

1113142804153167872.text: On average, women are paid just 80 cents for every $1 paid to male counterparts.  For women of color, the #wagegap is much larger.  #EqualPay

1113141545614503936.text: The #PaycheckFairnessAct would help close the #wagegap by giving workers stronger tools to combat wage discrimination. #EqualPayDay

1113140287360995328.text: On this #EqualPayDay we celebrate the passage of the #PaycheckFairnessAct in the House and call upon the Senate to also pass it and send it to President’s desk.

1113139033188651008.text: Our nation’s diversity is beautiful, but its inequality is not. Let’s #TalkPay and discuss how we can actualize equality in the workplace.

1113135254510993413.text: Bottom-lineThe administration’s #DirtyWaterRule puts our water and our health at risk. I will do everything I can to stop this reckless scheme. #ProtectCleanWater

1113133995938549760.text: Whether it is changing weather patterns that impact droughts or contribute to major flooding, #ClimateChange impacts our water.

1113131488504033285.text: "@EPA pretends climate change & water quality are separate issues — they’re not." #ProtectCleanWater #ActOnClimate https://t.co/U1hfLC21v4

1113130221476175872.text: #ClimateChange is and will continue to impact our water. Which is why the last thing we should do is gut protections for streams, wetlands, and drinking water. We need to do everything we can to #ProtectCleanWater.

1113128963323428870.text: Polluted rivers and dirtier water flowing through our taps for our kids to drink is not the future families envision, but that is exactly what the #DirtyWaterRule could lead to if we do not reject this rule.

1113127705430687745.text: While slashing safeguards for clean water will impact all of us, the #DirtyWaterRule will disproportionately harm low-income communities and communities of color.

1113126450402476032.text: The #DirtyWaterRule puts the profits of corporate polluters before our health and our families ignoring science, law, and huge public support for commonsense protections for clean water. We can't allow it to move forward. #ProtectCleanWater

1113125187883491329.text: Yet, @realDonaldTrump’s administration wants to roll back protections for our water, creating one set of rules for corporate polluters and one for everyone else. #DirtyWaterRule

1113123930791743489.text: We need to do more to protect our water resources, not less. #ProtectCleanWater

1113084922984648705.text: The Network to Freedom Program will help to preserve the stories of enslaved individuals who risked everything for freedom, as well as the individuals who helped them during their harrowing journeys.

1113084167804407808.text: It is imperative that we protect historic sites, like those connected to the Underground Railroad, that tell the stories of all Americans.
